name: ContentDownloadHandlerFactory

methods.name: getContentDownloadHandler
methods.signature: public Sfc.ContentDownloadHandler getContentDownloadHandler(List<Id> var1, Sfc.ContentDownloadContext var2)
methods.description: Returns a ContentDownloadHandler for a given list of content IDs and a download context.

description: Use this interface to provide a class factory that Salesforce can call to create instances of your custom ContentDownloadHandler.
